actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the duty-free entry of potassium fluotantalate and synthetic tantalite / columbite concentrate.

summary.text: Provides for the duty-free entry into the United States of potassium fluotantalate and synthetic tantalite/columbite concentrate. (Amends 19 U.S.C. 1202)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the duty-free entry of potassium fluotantalate and synthetic tantalite / columbite concentrate.
